org.apache.flink.runtime.clusterframework

类 BootstrapTools

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.clusterframework.BootstrapTools

  • public class BootstrapTools
extends java.lang.Object
    Tools for starting JobManager and TaskManager processes, including the Actor Systems used to run the JobManager and TaskManager actors.

      • startActorSystem

        public static akka.actor.ActorSystem startActorSystem(Configuration configuration,
                                                      java.lang.String listeningAddress,
                                                      java.lang.String portRangeDefinition,
                                                      org.slf4j.Logger logger)
                                               throws java.lang.Exception
        Starts an ActorSystem with the given configuration listening at the address/ports.
        参数:
        configuration - The Flink configuration
        listeningAddress - The address to listen at.
        portRangeDefinition - The port range to choose a port from.
        logger - The logger to output log information.
        返回:
        The ActorSystem which has been started
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • startActorSystem

        public static akka.actor.ActorSystem startActorSystem(Configuration configuration,
                                                      java.lang.String listeningAddress,
                                                      int listeningPort,
                                                      org.slf4j.Logger logger)
                                               throws java.lang.Exception
        Starts an Actor System at a specific port.
        参数:
        configuration - The Flink configuration.
        listeningAddress - The address to listen at.
        listeningPort - The port to listen at.
        logger - the logger to output log information.
        返回:
        The ActorSystem which has been started.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • startWebMonitorIfConfigured

        public static WebMonitor startWebMonitorIfConfigured(Configuration config,
                                                     HighAvailabilityServices highAvailabilityServices,
                                                     LeaderGatewayRetriever<JobManagerGateway> jobManagerRetriever,
                                                     MetricQueryServiceRetriever queryServiceRetriever,
                                                     Time timeout,
                                                     ScheduledExecutor scheduledExecutor,
                                                     org.slf4j.Logger logger)
                                              throws java.lang.Exception
        Starts the web frontend.
        参数:
        config - The Flink config.
        highAvailabilityServices - Service factory for high availability services
        jobManagerRetriever - to retrieve the leading JobManagerGateway
        queryServiceRetriever - to resolve a query service
        timeout - for asynchronous operations
        scheduledExecutor - to run asynchronous operations
        logger - Logger for log output
        返回:
        WebMonitor instance.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • generateTaskManagerConfiguration

        public static Configuration generateTaskManagerConfiguration(Configuration baseConfig,
                                                             java.lang.String jobManagerHostname,
                                                             int jobManagerPort,
                                                             int numSlots,
                                                             scala.concurrent.duration.FiniteDuration registrationTimeout)
        Generate a task manager configuration.
        参数:
        baseConfig - Config to start from.
        jobManagerHostname - Job manager host name.
        jobManagerPort - Port of the job manager.
        numSlots - Number of slots to configure.
        registrationTimeout - Timeout for registration
        返回:
        TaskManager configuration

      • substituteDeprecatedConfigPrefix

        public static void substituteDeprecatedConfigPrefix(Configuration config,
                                                    java.lang.String deprecatedPrefix,
                                                    java.lang.String designatedPrefix)
        Sets the value of a new config key to the value of a deprecated config key. Taking into account the changed prefix.
        参数:
        config - Config to write
        deprecatedPrefix - Old prefix of key
        designatedPrefix - New prefix of key

      • newDynamicPropertiesOption

        public static org.apache.commons.cli.Option newDynamicPropertiesOption()
        Get an instance of the dynamic properties option. Dynamic properties allow the user to specify additional configuration values with -D, such as -Dfs.overwrite-files=true -Dtaskmanager.network.memory.min=536346624

      • parseDynamicProperties

        public static Configuration parseDynamicProperties(org.apache.commons.cli.CommandLine cmd)

      • getTaskManagerShellCommand

        public static java.lang.String getTaskManagerShellCommand(Configuration flinkConfig,
                                                          ContaineredTaskManagerParameters tmParams,
                                                          java.lang.String configDirectory,
                                                          java.lang.String logDirectory,
                                                          boolean hasLogback,
                                                          boolean hasLog4j,
                                                          boolean hasKrb5,
                                                          java.lang.Class<?> mainClass)
        Generates the shell command to start a task manager.
        参数:
        flinkConfig - The Flink configuration.
        tmParams - Paramaters for the task manager.
        configDirectory - The configuration directory for the flink-conf.yaml
        logDirectory - The log directory.
        hasLogback - Uses logback?
        hasLog4j - Uses log4j?
        mainClass - The main class to start with.
        返回:
        A String containing the task manager startup command.

      • getStartCommand

        public static java.lang.String getStartCommand(java.lang.String template,
                                               java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> startCommandValues)
        Replaces placeholders in the template start command with values from startCommandValues.

        If the default template ConfigConstants.DEFAULT_YARN_CONTAINER_START_COMMAND_TEMPLATE is used, the following keys must be present in the map or the resulting command will still contain placeholders:

        • java = path to the Java executable
        • jvmmem = JVM memory limits and tweaks
        • jvmopts = misc options for the Java VM
        • logging = logging-related configuration settings
        • class = main class to execute
        • args = arguments for the main class
        • redirects = output redirects

        参数:
        template - a template start command with placeholders
        startCommandValues - a replacement map placeholder -> value
        返回:
        the start command with placeholders filled in
